instruction: Fill the Sequence Numbers as "No. #" in the "Seq No." column

minimal: `CLICK` the first cell under the "Seq No." column
`TYPING` ="No. "&SEQUENCE(n) where 'n' is the total number of rows you want to fill.
batched: `CLICK` the first cell under the "Seq No." column
`TYPING` ="No. "&SEQUENCE(n) where 'n' is the total number of rows you want to fill.
